## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                  | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `inward`  | `inward`  | Whether to animate inward instead of outward | `boolean` | `false` |
| `visible` | `visible` | Whether the focus ring is visible            | `boolean` | `false` |
